publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1260 Mr Jim Wallace: Motion of Condolence-That the Parliament expresses its deep regret and sadness at the untimely death of its First Minister, The Rt Hon Donald Dewar MP, MSP; offers its sympathy and sincere condolences to his family and many friends whose grief is shared by all members of this Parliament; agrees that tributes should now be paid to a distinguished Parliamentarian and great leader of Scotland; further agrees that as a mark of respect no other business will be taken today. Supported by: Henry McLeish*, Mr John Swinney*, David McLetchie*, Mr Sam Galbraith*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Susan Deacon*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Sarah Boyack*, Mr Jack McConnell*, Ross Finnie*, Neil Davidson*, Dennis Canavan*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Tavish Scott*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr John Munro*, George Lyon*, Bill Aitken*, Brian Adam*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Nick Johnston*, Mike Watson*, Alex Johnstone*, Rhoda Grant*, Maureen Macmillan*, David Mundell*, Alex Fergusson*, Elaine Smith*, Donald Gorrie*, John Scott*, Mr George Reid*, Patricia Ferguson*, Elaine Thomson*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Allan Wilson*, Kay Ullrich*, Fiona McLeod*, Helen Eadie*, Janis Hughes*, Pauline McNeill*, Iain Gray*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Fergus Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Fiona Hyslop*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Colin Campbell*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Peter Peacock*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Iain Smith*, Michael Russell*, Gordon Jackson*, Euan Robson*, Margaret Smith*, Hugh Henry*, Nicol Stephen*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr John McAllion*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Ian Jenkins*, Robert Brown*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nora Radcliffe*, Kate MacLean*
